title: Corporate Carbon Accounting Report
description: A sustainability consultant is preparing a carbon accounting report for a client, covering their Scope 2 emissions from purchased electricity.

tasks.description: Gather the client's electricity consumption data (in MWh) for all their facilities for the past year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles the total electricity usage.

tasks.description: For each facility, find the appropriate regional grid emission factor (e.g., from eGRID) to calculate emissions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the correct emission factors (in kg CO2e/MWh) for each location.

tasks.description: Calculate the total Scope 2 emissions for the client in metric tons of CO2 equivalent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent computes the final emissions figure.

tasks.description: Generate a report compliant with the GHG Protocol, detailing the methodology and results.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a formal carbon accounting report.
